Title: Frank Gallagher: Loving Husband, Devoted Father
Writer: John Wells (developed for american television by), Paul Abbott (creator), Etan Frankel
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Justin Chatwin, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Desperate to come up with a plan to pay two goons looking for the $6000 that he owes, Frank stumbles onto a risky solution that might work -- if his family goes along with it.
